articles.description: All the reaction as Man City's win takes them closer to Champions League, before Tottenham & Man United's Europa League final build-up.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Man City close in on Champions League as De Bruyne plays last home game

articles.description: As Bruno Fernandes leads Man Utd out against Tottenham in the Europa League final, BBC Sport look at his journey - including almost signing for Spurs.
articles.title: Europa League final: How Bruno Fernandes became Manchester United's heart

articles.description: How will Europa League final rivals Ange Postecoglou and Ruben Amorim be preparing for the final?
articles.title: Europa League final: Spurs v Man Utd - How do you prepare for a final of this magnitude??

articles.description: The winners of Wednesday's Europa League final between Manchester United and Tottenham will be the lowest league finishers ever to win a major European trophy. BBC Sport examines their seasons, motives and stats.
articles.title: Europa League final: Manchester United and Tottenham meet in out-of-form final

articles.description: Real Madrid and England midfielder will undergo shoulder surgery after the Club World Cup and is set to miss the start of next season.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham surgery: Real Madrid and England midfielder to miss start of next season

articles.description: Zimbabwe's Blessing Muzarabani may have a permanent smile on his face, but he will pose a serious threat to England at Trent Bridge this week, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England v Zimbabwe: Blessing Muzarabani ready for England in Trent Bridge Test

articles.description: NFL players have been given permission to compete in flag football at the 2028 Olympics, meaning Team USA could select a new 'Dream Team'.
articles.title: LA 2028: NFL vote sees new Olympic 'Dream Team' move closer

articles.description: Pep Guardiola has said he will quit as Manchester City manager unless he is given a smaller squad next season.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Manchester City manager says he will quit club if squad size not reduced

articles.description: 'Magic' Maria Caldentey is facing her old club Barcelona for the first time - can she help deliver a Champions League trophy with Arsenal?
articles.title: Women's Champions League: Is 'magic' Caldentey Arsenal's key in final?

articles.description: Jack Draper's improved clay-court game makes him one of the French Open's contenders - but what makes a player excel on the surface?
articles.title: French Open 2025: What makes a good clay-court player?
